name: Florges
description: The Garden Pokémon. It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.

abilities.name: Flower Veil
abilities.description: Any grass-type ally within 15 feet of this Pokémon is immune to new status effects.

abilities.name: Symbiosis
abilities.description: This Pokémon may swap held items with an ally as a free action, as long as they are within 15 feet of each other.
